name: BBG - Meeting Lounge
description:
The main focus of this game is for a Meeting place for my team to hang out for meetings, and also shoot a few bots.  Its a basic shooter that will later be sold as a UE4 project so others can make their own games faster.

Controls List.

WASD movement.  Mouse Look.  V brings you to First Person View, gives a crosshair and you can now shoot by using mouse left button.  Right mouse button while in that mode will toggle a scope with zoom.  F turns on flashlight, and is aimable in first person mode.  Escape brings up a menu to return to the main menu or resume.
